# ESP32-S3 Partition Table for Scribe Pr: # - We use LittleFS as our actual filesystem (see platformio.ini: board_build.filesystem = littlefs)
# - The partition subtype MUST be "spiffs" (0x82) - this is the only valid filesystem subtype
# - The partition name is "littlefs" for clarity
# - NVS: 32KB (config storage - increased from 20KB due to NVS space errors)
# - app0: 2.88MB (primary firmware slot - MUST be 64KB aligned at 0x20000)
# - app1: 2.88MB (secondary firmware slot for OTA updates - MUST be 64KB aligned)
# - LittleFS: 2.12MB (filesystem for web assets - ends exactly at 0x800000)
# IMPORTANT: App partitions MUST start at 0x10000-aligned addresses on ESP32-S3
